text: Nām avarukku is'hākkaiyum, yaḥkūpaiyum (cantatiyākak) koṭuttaruḷiṉōm, ivarkaḷ aṉaivaraiyum nām nērvaḻiyil celuttiṉōm; itaṟku muṉṉar nām nūhaiyum avaruṭaiya cantatiyiliruntu tāvūtu, sulaimāṉ, ayyūp, yūsup, mūsā, hārūṉ ākiyōraiyum nērvaḻiyil celuttiṉōm; ippaṭiyē nām naṉmai purivōrukku naṟkūli vaḻaṅkukiṟōm
